column4: wubi is a full linux install, except that the filesystem is just a file inside the windows filesystem

I tried to pull it out of him and he didn't want to "take away from his windows experience" yeah okay... anyway he's helping me with a linux project so he HAS to have something to compile on... He's been using vmware but thinks it's too slow
I personally strongly recommend against it for the reasons listed on bug #428195
that said, wubi is a dual boot, pure and simple
